message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about we compromise at $127.50?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet in the middle at $128.25?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $126?
I'm starting to think we're close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $128.50?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $127?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think $130 is a fair price for this product. It's the highest I'm willing to go.
